## Data Analysis

Generate some random numbers:

```{r eval=FALSE, echo=TRUE}
rnorm(50)
```

```{r eval=TRUE, echo=FALSE}
timeseries_1 <- rnorm(50)
timeseries_1
```

## Ploting time series

Plot random numbers like time series:

```{r plot, echo=TRUE}
plot(ts(timeseries_1, start = 0), ylab = "", xlab = "Time")
```
